sourcesContent:
import i18n from 'i18next'
import LanguageDetector from 'i18next-browser-languagedetector'
import { LayoutAnimation } from 'react-native'
import {messages} from './languages'

i18n
    .use(LanguageDetector)
    .init ({
        debug: false,
        defaultNS: ['translations'],
        fallbackLng: 'pt',
        ns: ['translations'],
        resources: messages

    })

export {i18n}
